title: PTD Today — Media

items.title: New: AWS Lambda tenant isolation | Serverless Office Hours

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AWS Lambda's new tenant isolation mode provides dedicated execution environments per tenant to keep cached data and execution contexts siloed and prevent cross-tenant data exposure. The feature aims to simplify infrastructure, enable faster scaling during traffic spikes, and includes built-in monitoring with automatic tenant identifier logging for easier tenant-specific debugging.
bullets: Dedicated execution environments per tenant to silo cached data and execution contexts.
Prevents cross-tenant data exposure by enforcing stronger isolation boundaries.
Reduces infrastructure complexity while maintaining robust security guarantees.
Enables faster scaling during traffic spikes for tenant workloads.
Built-in monitoring with automatic tenant identifier logging for easier debugging.
takeaways: Adopting tenant isolation can reduce cross-tenant data exposure risk and support security/compliance goals.
Simpler infrastructure may lower operational overhead and management complexity for multi-tenant SaaS.
Improved scaling during spikes can reduce the need for overprovisioning and improve tenant experience.
Automatic tenant identifier logging enhances observability and speeds tenant-specific incident investigation.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this PwC year-end toolkit episode focuses on the statement of cash flows, an area of continuing investor and regulator attention. The discussion covers SEC comment letter themes, practical guidance for complex transactions (debt restructurings, payment processing arrangements, business combinations), reminders and best practices, and a note on a FASB project on targeted improvements.
bullets: Overview and key reminders on preparing the statement of cash flows
SEC comment letter themes related to cash flow presentation
Practical considerations for debt restructurings
Impacts of payment processing arrangements on cash flow classification
Treatment and presentation issues in business combinations; update on FASB project
takeaways: Ensure clear cash flow classification and disclosure at year-end — investors and regulators are focused on the statement of cash flows.
Review accounting and presentation for any debt restructurings to confirm correct operating vs. financing classification and disclosures.
Evaluate payment processing arrangements for timing and classification impacts on cash flows and required disclosures.
Assess business combination accounting and presentation early to address year‑end reporting and potential FASB changes.

items.title: Build Voice Agents with Amazon Nova 2 Sonic & AgentCore | AWS Show and Tell

ai.summary: Based on the available description…This AWS Show and Tell episode showcases Amazon Nova 2 Sonic and how it advances voice agents with features like polyglot voices, a 1‑million token context window, and asynchronous tool calling. It also covers Amazon Bedrock AgentCore’s WebSocket bidirectional streaming, Strands BidiAgent integration, and includes hands‑on Python demos and workshop code links for building production voice agents.
bullets: Nova 2 Sonic: polyglot voices, 1M token context windows, asynchronous tool calling
AgentCore bidirectional streaming via WebSocket for real‑time two‑way voice interactions
Strands BidiAgent integration for interruption handling and agent‑to‑agent collaboration
Practical Python implementation and best practices demonstrated
Workshop materials and code samples available on GitHub
takeaways: Ensure infrastructure supports WebSocket bidirectional streaming for low‑latency, real‑time voice interactions (AgentCore)
Prepare compute and memory capacity to handle very large context windows (1M tokens) for Nova 2 Sonic
Plan backend integrations and orchestration to support asynchronous tool calling and agent collaboration
Support multi‑language audio workflows and switching for polyglot voice capabilities
Provide developer environments and access controls for deploying production voice agent demos and workshop code

items.title: I Travel The World And Live Rent-Free By Pet Sitting Full Time

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Charly Stoever, a 35-year-old financial coach, has spent the last 18 months living out of two suitcases while pet sitting full time and earning $60,000 a year, which lets her live rent-free in Portland, Oregon. The profile is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
bullets: Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach who pet sits full time.
She earns $60,000 a year from pet sitting.
Has lived rent-free in Portland, Oregon by pet sitting.
Spent the last 18 months living out of two suitcases while traveling.
Story is featured in CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
takeaways: Concrete data point: an individual can generate $60,000/year through full-time pet sitting while avoiding rent—useful when modeling alternative local income streams.
Example of extreme location flexibility (18 months, travel, two-suitcase lifestyle) to consider when assessing transient or mobile workforce availability near facilities.
Demonstrates demand for short-term, low-overhead living arrangements that may affect local housing and service needs around grid/data-center sites.
Profiles like this highlight nontraditional employment models worth tracking for workforce recruitment, retention, and community engagement planning.

items.title: AI w cenach transferowych – jak wykorzystać jej potencjał? | Monika Palmowska, Jakub Roszkiewicz

ai.summary: Based on the available description… W podcaście KPMG ON AIR eksperci z Zespołu ds. Cen Transferowych omawiają obecne i przyszłe zastosowania AI w cenach transferowych — od monitorowania rentowności i analiz porównawczych, przez automatyzację dokumentacji, aż po integrację z ERP. Poruszono też kwestie bezpieczeństwa danych, zgodności (RODO), ryzyk związanych z halucynacjami AI oraz znaczenie uporządkowania procesów, person i kompetencji przy wdrożeniu.
bullets: Przykłady zastosowań AI: monitoring rentowności, inteligentne benchmarki i automatyzacja dokumentacji cen transferowych.
AI ma wzmacniać pracę doradców podatkowych, nie zastępować ich — rola eksperta pozostaje kluczowa.
Ryzyka: dane, bezpieczeństwo, ryzyko halucynacji oraz wymogi RODO.
Digital Gateway wskazany jako przykład bezpiecznego środowiska do pracy z AI; integracja z ERP podkreślona jako istotna.
Wdrożenie: zacząć od uporządkowania procesów, definiowania person i rozwijania kompetencji młodszych pracowników.
takeaways: Zapewnij bezpieczne środowiska do pracy z AI (np. rozwiązania typu Digital Gateway) i rygorystyczne zarządzanie danymi.
Planuj integrację AI z istniejącymi systemami ERP, aby wykorzystać inteligentne benchmarki i automatyzację procesów.
Zadbaj o zgodność z RODO i procedury przeciwdziałania halucynacjom/modelowym błędom przy analizach podatkowych.
Uporządkuj procesy, role i upskilluj zespół jako fundament skutecznego wdrożenia AI.
Przygotuj infrastrukturę (bezpieczeństwo, dostęp do danych, skalowalność), by obsłużyć monitorowanie rentowności i automatyzację dokumentacji.

bullets: Positioned to help maintain momentum across tasks and goals.

Broad, everyday-use framing aimed at user continuity.
takeaways: The emphasis on sustaining momentum suggests relevance for maintaining project continuity and team productivity.
Messaging focused on ongoing support may aid adoption for recurring operational or long-duration tasks.
Decision-makers can view this positioning as a cue to evaluate Copilot’s fit for workflows that require consistent progress and follow-through.
Consider how a general-purpose assistant marketed for momentum might support staff engagement, training continuity, and iterative operational processes.

Ensure data center networking and I/O are aligned to exploit CPU performance for sub-second trade execution.
Investing in high-performance CPUs can help reduce execution risk and improve trading outcomes.
